last_episode_to_air.name: The Intergalactic 147
last_episode_to_air.overview: A giant spaceship is spotted heading for Earth. It's part of the ""Intergalactic 147"" snooker game and it wants to put the Earth into a black hole.

name: Danger Mouse
overview: Danger Mouse, the world's greatest secret agent, and his side-kick Penfold work to foil the evil schemes of Baron Greenback.

episodes.name: Rogue Robots
episodes.overview: Danger Mouse discovers that Baron Greenback is behind a wave of attack robots that have been going after agents.

episodes.name: Who Stole the Bagpipes?
episodes.overview: Danger Mouse and Penfold travel to Scotland to keep Greenback from destroying the world with music from all the world's bagpipes.

episodes.name: Trouble With Ghosts
episodes.overview: Greenback captures Colonel K and has the Colonel send Danger Mouse and Penfold on holiday to a haunted castle in Transylvania.

episodes.name: Chicken Run
episodes.overview: Greenback steals a growth serum from Professor Skwakencluck and with it creates giant chickens to take over the world. And for once Penfold saves the day!

episodes.name: The Martian Misfit
episodes.overview: Greenback creates a `Martian' to keep Danger Mouse busy while he sets out on a crime spree.

episodes.name: The Dream Machine
episodes.overview: Greenback drives Danger Mouse and Penfold crazy with his dream machine.

episodes.name: Lord of the Bungle
episodes.overview: A fall causes Penfold to think he is the Lord of the Jungle, when he and Danger Mouse try to find out why elephants are being turned into sugar cubes.

episodes.name: Die Laughing
episodes.overview: Greenback is causing the world's leaders to laugh themselves to death in his latest plot to become ruler of the Earth.

episodes.name: The World of Machines
episodes.overview: Greenback kidnaps Penfold to lure Danger Mouse into a spaceship and send both of them to a planet ruled by machines.

episodes.name: Ice Station Camel
episodes.overview: Danger Mouse must stop Greenback who has stopped the Earth's rotation which in turn has canceled gravity.

episodes.name: A Plague of Pyramids
episodes.overview: Danger Mouse discovers Greenback is behind a plague of pyramids which are popping up all over England and threatening to sink England.

episodes.name: Custard
episodes.overview: Danger Mouse travels to outer space to find a custard mite and bring him to Earth after Greenback floods the world in instant custard.

episodes.name: Close Encounters of the Absurd Kind
episodes.overview: Aliens capture Danger Mouse and Penfold for use in an experiment when they journey to the Bermuda Triangle on the trail of Baron Greenback.

episodes.name: The Duel
episodes.overview: Greenback tells Danger Mouse that he will go straight if Danger Mouse beats him in a duel and if Danger Mouse promises to quit his job if he is the loser.

episodes.name: The Day of the Suds
episodes.overview: Washing machines under the control of Greenback threaten to destroy London.

episodes.name: The Bad Luck Eye of the Little Yellow God
episodes.overview: Greenback has stolen a bad luck charm for use in a bad luck ray. Danger Mouse manages to get it and attempts to give it back to the original owners who don't really want it back.

episodes.name: The Four Tasks of Danger Mouse
episodes.overview: Greenback kidnaps Penfold to get Danger Mouse to bring him four ingredients needed for an evil spell. Danger Mouse meets Count Duckula when one ingredient turns out to be the feather of a vampire duck.

episodes.name: The Invasion of Colonel 'K'
episodes.overview: Greenback shrinks himself and enters Colonel K's body to learn all of the Colonel's secrets.

episodes.name: Danger Mouse Saves the World ... Again
episodes.overview: Danger Mouse is captured by Greenback when Greenback threatens to destroy all the world's signposts, and is subjected to a brain picker to remove all his thoughts.

episodes.name: The Odd Ball Runaround
episodes.overview: Greenback is determined to steal plans that Danger Mouse and Penfold are transporting from Australia to London.

episodes.name: The Strange Case of the Ghost Bus
episodes.overview: Danger Mouse is sent to the Indian Ocean to investigate several ship sinkings caused by ghost-like buses that vanish.

episodes.name: Trip to America
episodes.overview: Danger Mouse travels to the United States where he teams up with a Texan to defeat Greenback, who has shrunk and stolen the world's greatest buildings.

episodes.name: The Wild, Wild Goose Chase
episodes.overview: Danger Mouse finds a computerized hideout locator which leads him to Baron Greenback's hideouts.

episodes.name: The Return of Count Duckula
episodes.overview: Agent 57, the master of disguise, helps Danger Mouse defeat Count Duckula who has teamed up with Greenback to turn Parliament show-biz crazy.

episodes.name: Demons Aren't Dull
episodes.overview: A Demon from the 4th dimension dares Danger Mouse to stop him from stealing famous buildings.

episodes.name: 150 Million Years Lost
episodes.overview: Danger Mouse must rescue Penfold after Professor Squakencluck's time machine sends Penfold back in time.

episodes.name: Planet of the Cats
episodes.overview: Danger Mouse and Penfold end up in the future where the world is ruled by cats who are taking orders from a descendent of Greenback.

episodes.name: Four Heads Are Better than Two
episodes.overview: Colonel K teams Danger Mouse up with a robot Penfold and Penfold with a robot Danger Mouse so one pair can help Agent 57 and the other can capture Greenback.

episodes.name: Tower of Terror
episodes.overview: Danger Mouse tracks Greenback down to a New York skyscraper where strange things happen to the World's Greatest Secret Agent.

episodes.name: The Great Bone Idol
episodes.overview: Count Duckula and Greenback team up to find the Bone Idol which can control all the dogs in the world.

episodes.name: Public Enemy No. 1
episodes.overview: It is up to Penfold to stop Danger Mouse when he takes up a life of crime.

episodes.name: The Long Lost Crown Affair
episodes.overview: Greenback ruins a holiday for Danger Mouse and Penfold who are in the Amazon jungle searching for the long lost crown that belonged to an Aztec ruler.

episodes.name: By George, It's a Dragon
episodes.overview: Danger Mouse and Penfold travel to Wales to battle a dragon called Jones.

episodes.name: Tiptoe Through the Penfolds
episodes.overview: Greenback tests his new duplication machine on Penfold, which malfunctions and leaves him with hundreds of Penfolds to deal with.

episodes.name: Project Moon
episodes.overview: Danger Mouse and Penfold journey to the moon to put a radio jamming station Greenback has built there out of operation.

episodes.name: The Next Ice Age Begins at Midnight
episodes.overview: Greenback threatens to use his weather control machine to create an ice age if he is not crowned king of the world.

episodes.name: The Aliens are Coming
episodes.overview: Danger Mouse and Penfold are chosen as Ambassadors to meet aliens and end up being terrorized by their giant toys.

episodes.name: Remote-Controlled Chaos
episodes.overview: Greenback makes a device to control DM's car.

episodes.name: The Man From Gadget
episodes.overview: A salesman of gadgets for secret agents tries to sell Danger Mouse devices which will help him in reaching Greenback's hard to reach hideout.

episodes.name: Tampering With Time Tickles
episodes.overview: Greenback develops age-altering bombs which turn Danger Mouse into an over eager youth and puts Penfold on the verge of senility.

episodes.name: Nero Power
episodes.overview: Nero gains strange powers, which he uses to terrorize Danger Mouse and Penfold, after he falls into one of Greenback's inventions.

episodes.name: Once Upon a Timeslip...
episodes.overview: Penfold and Dangermouse get transported to the year 1215AD thanks to a fluke in the narrorator's mic. They now have to act out a twisted version of Robin Starring Dangermouse As Robin Hood and Penfold as Little John

episodes.name: Viva Danger Mouse
episodes.overview: Greenback raids Mexico's cacti to plant the pins in the most important cushions in Briatin.

episodes.name: Play it Again, Wufgang
episodes.overview: Danger Mouse and Penfold go after a mad composer who has destroyed all the world's music.

episodes.name: Hear, Hear
episodes.overview: Penfold's hearing problems make him immune to a device that brainwashes anyone who hears Greenback's voice.

episodes.name: Multiplication Fable
episodes.overview: An alien pet escapes from a crash-landed spaceship and it multiplies whenever something touches it, making its capture difficult.

episodes.name: The Spy Who Stayed in With a Cold
episodes.overview: Agent 57 teams up with Danger Mouse to defeat Baron Greenback when Penfold stays home with a cold; the only problem is 57 gets it too and every time he sneezes he changes disguise.

episodes.name: It's All White, White Wonder
episodes.overview: An experimental enzyme escapes into the sewers and turns everything it comes in contact with white.

episodes.name: The Hickory Dickory Dock Dilemma
episodes.overview: Danger Mouse and Penfold end up in a time-traveling clock when they investigate an attempted robbery of the crown jewels.

episodes.name: What a Three-Point Turn-Up For the Book
episodes.overview: Danger Mouse goes after his car, which has taken off on its own, keeping Danger Mouse from attending an award ceremony.

episodes.name: Quark! Quark!
episodes.overview: Penfold is instrumental in keeping alien, J.J. Quark, from taking over the Earth.

episodes.name: Alping is Snow Easy Matter
episodes.overview: Greenback is melting the polar ice caps to cause a flood and open up a market to sell rubber rafts at inflated prices.

episodes.name: Aaagghg!! Spiders!
episodes.overview: With Greenback on vacation, Stiletto uses a ray to create giant spiders to take over London.

episodes.name: One of Our Stately Homes is Missing
episodes.overview: Danger Mouse assists Bleep, Bleep recovers an old English home that is being held for ransom.

episodes.name: Afternoon Off - With the Fangboner!
episodes.overview: The alien J.J. Quark returns and sends a Fangboner to attack Danger Mouse.

episodes.name: Beware of Mexicans Delivering Milk
episodes.overview: Penfold must defeat El Loco after he drugs Danger Mouse's milk.

episodes.name: Cat-Astrophe
episodes.overview: Greenback creates a mechanical cat that kidnaps Colonel K.

episodes.name: The Good, the Bad and the Motionless
episodes.overview: Danger Mouse investigates strange goings-on at Stonehenge only to battle his evil alter-ego.

episodes.name: Statues
episodes.overview: Greenback devises a ray that animates London's statues and causes them to wreak havoc.

episodes.name: The Clock Strikes Back
episodes.overview: The clock returns with Merlin's predecessor as its passenger and it's up to Danger Mouse and Penfold to stop the wizard from taking over the world.

episodes.name: Ee - Tea!
episodes.overview: Greenback has London at a standstill after he steals all of the world's tea.

episodes.name: Bandits, Beans and Ballyhoo!
episodes.overview: Unpacking from a holiday in Mexico, Penfold discovers El Loco hiding in his suitcase. El Loco gets loose and goes on a crime spree in London.

episodes.name: Have You Fled From Any Good Books Lately?
episodes.overview: Penfold's gift from J.J. Quark sets monsters after Danger Mouse and Penfold.

episodes.name: Tut, Tut, It's Not Pharaoh
episodes.overview: Greenback sets out to steal an ancient Egyptian amulet which Danger Mouse and Penfold have been sent to find.

episodes.name: Lost, Found and Spellbound
episodes.overview: Danger Mouse battles a witch doctor when he and Penfold go to rescue Professor Squakencluck whose plane crashed in the China sea.

episodes.name: Penfold, BF
episodes.overview: Penfold swallows Professor Squakencluck's new pill and is turned into a super hero which causes Danger Mouse more problems than usual as he searches for a lost messenger pigeon.

episodes.name: Mechanised Mayhem
episodes.overview: Under orders from a super computer, all the world's machines mutiny and refuse to do their jobs.

episodes.name: Journey to the Earth's... Cor!
episodes.overview: Penfold and Danger Mouse journey to the center of the Earth to stop a loud noise that originates there.

episodes.name: Danger Mouse on the Orient Express
episodes.overview: Danger Mouse and Penfold travel on the Orient Express with a document they obtained from Greenback.

episodes.name: The Ultra Secret Secret
episodes.overview: Greenback offers to team up with Danger Mouse in order to thwart an alien invasion.

episodes.name: Duckula Meets Frankenstoat
episodes.overview: Count Duckula teams up with Dr Frankenstoat to take over the world with an army of robot vampoids.

episodes.name: Where There's a Well There's a Way
episodes.overview: Danger Mouse is sent to find Merlin's magic ink well which will grant the finder a wish.

episodes.name: All Fall Down
episodes.overview: Danger Mouse must recover plans to a top secret device capable of shattering the world.

episodes.name: Tide of the Turn
episodes.overview: Danger Mouse travels to the moon and discovers it has been turned into a scrap yard, which has caused the tide to change and flood the Earth.

episodes.name: Gremlin Alert
episodes.overview: Danger Mouse and Penfold set out to stop the illogical Gremlin from turning Earth's sunlight into darkness.

episodes.name: Cor! What a Picture!
episodes.overview: Penfold tries to kill Danger Mouse after Greenback steals a picture of Penfold for use in a mind control machine.

episodes.name: I Spy With My Little Eye...
episodes.overview: Danger Mouse and Penfold are sent to the Arctic when Greenback threatens to melt the polar ice with sun lamps.

episodes.name: Bigfoot Falls
episodes.overview: Danger Mouse and Penfold are sent to track down a huge hairy monster that has been crushing the local villages. When they find it they discover he's actually friendly, but suffers from extreme bouts of sore-feet. They get help from the RCMP - Royal Canadian Mounted Podiatrists.

episodes.name: The Statue of Liberty Caper
episodes.overview: Danger Mouse is sent to stop Greenback who is behind the theft of America's greatest buildings.

episodes.name: Penfold Transformed
episodes.overview: Professor Crumhorn creates a robot duplicate of Penfold (which is far more efficient than the original). At the push of a button it transforms into a giant machine intent on destroying Danger Mouse.

episodes.name: A Dune With a View
episodes.overview: The Mark III runs out of gas, leaving DM and Penfold stranded in the Sahara Desert.

episodes.name: Don Coyote and... Sancho Penfold
episodes.overview: While on holiday in Spain, Penfold is kidnapped by a mad Coyote who thinks he is Don Quixote. They go tilting at a windmill that happens to contain Baron Greenback's latest device for world domination.

episodes.name: Crumhorn Strikes Back!
episodes.overview: Professor Crumhorn returns and uses his transformation pills to turn himself into a little girl in an attempt to get Danger Mouse to break into Fort Knox.

episodes.name: Ants, Trees and ... Whoops-A-Daisy
episodes.overview: Just when Penfold should be meeting his Aunt and the airport, he and Danger Mouse are sent to the Amazon jungle where a tribe have been sacrificing people to The Great Ant God from Ataxia. Penfold is captured, and things look grim, but then Penfold's Aunt arrives from a taxi and tells them all to stop playing silly games.

episodes.name: There's A Penfold In My Suit
episodes.overview: Penfold puts on Danger Mouse's suit and can't get out. From then on everyone thinks he is Danger Mouse. Later, DM and Penfold go to Bratislavakia to find out why all the countries of Central Europe have swapped places. There they fall fowl of a mystical stone that causes people to swap bodies.

episodes.name: Rhyme And Punishment
episodes.overview: Dr Crumhorn ""Ka-zonks"" DM and Penfold into a hallucinatory world in an attempt to drive them crazy.

episodes.name: Pillow Fright!
episodes.overview: Greenback attempts to take over England with his latest invention...an army of remote control, allergy causing pillows.

episodes.name: Heavy Duty
episodes.overview: Crumhorn invents a chemical that allows him to create land sharks to terrorize London. Things get even more complicated when Penfold gets into the formula.

episodes.name: The Intergalactic 147
episodes.overview: A giant spaceship is spotted heading for Earth. It's part of the ""Intergalactic 147"" snooker game and it wants to put the Earth into a black hole.
